verbs.description: [ARG1: The alliance between the US and Europe] [V: flourished] [ARGM-TMP: during the Cold War] , but has cooled off since then . President Donald Trump drove the final nail in the coffin by withdrawing the US from the Iran nuclear deal .

The alliance between the US and Europe flourished during the Cold War , but [V: has] cooled off since then . President Donald Trump drove the final nail in the coffin by withdrawing the US from the Iran nuclear deal .

[ARG1: The alliance between the US and Europe] flourished during the Cold War , but has [V: cooled] off [ARGM-TMP: since then] . President Donald Trump drove the final nail in the coffin by withdrawing the US from the Iran nuclear deal .

The alliance between the US and Europe flourished during the Cold War , but has cooled off since then . [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: drove] [ARG1: the final nail in the coffin] [ARGM-MNR: by withdrawing the US from the Iran nuclear deal] .

The alliance between the US and Europe flourished during the Cold War , but has cooled off since then . [ARG0: President Donald Trump] drove the final nail in the coffin by [V: withdrawing] [ARG1: the US] [ARG2: from the Iran nuclear deal] .
